name: Circuitron (Xenoparrot)
description:
Play as the abandoned AI Circuitron in a time stopping platformer! There are 10 levels, and playtime likely won't exceed 10 minutes. Made for Xanderjam 5. Made by a team of 2. The theme "time" is applied by the gameplay mechanic of pausing time to platform on falling objects.

Controls: WASD and Arrows to move and jump. R to reset, and T to stop and start time.

If browser build doesn't load, play the downloadable version!

Necessary credits: I used SuperUnityBuild for this, it keeps the process of building to multiple platforms from taking hours during game jams. Made by Chase Petit and Robin North.
